name: Box's Dream
description:
Box's Dream is an elegant puzzle game where you'll have to push boxes into the correct positions, but it won't be easy, as various challenges such as ice floors, holes, pistons and many others await you in this exciting and unforgettable experience.



Resources

■ Fun and challenging gameplay.
■ Creative and thought-provoking mechanics.
■ 30 unique levels.
■ Immersive and relaxing visual effects and soundtrack.
■ Trophy system.
